requirements.summary: Update the browser tab title and all HTML meta tags (including Apple mobile web app title) to use 'Shake.com' instead of the current app name
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'Shake.com' as the page title
Apple mobile web app meta tag name is updated to 'Shake.com'

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag content from the current app name to 'Shake.com'. Update the apple-mobile-web-app-title meta tag content to 'Shake.com'. Ensure all other meta tags remain unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the PWA manifest so that 'name' and 'short_name' fields are both set to 'Shake.com'
acceptanceCriteria: When installed as a PWA, the home screen icon label reads 'Shake.com'

file_operations.description: Update the 'name' field from 'Wrapper AI' to 'Shake.com'. Update the 'short_name' field from 'Wrapper AI' to 'Shake.com'. Keep all other manifest properties (theme_color, background_color, display, icons) unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update all visible logo text, app name labels, and header/sidebar branding throughout the frontend UI to display 'Shake.com' instead of the previous app name ('Wrapper AI')
acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'Wrapper AI' remains visible in the UI
The login screen (if it shows an app name) displays 'Shake.com'

file_operations.description: Replace all occurrences of 'Wrapper AI' with 'Shake.com' in the sidebar header/logo section and any other visible branding text within the authenticated layout component.
Replace all occurrences of 'Wrapper AI' with 'Shake.com' in the login screen UI, including any heading, title, or branding text visible to unauthenticated users.
Replace all occurrences of 'Wrapper AI' with 'Shake.com' in the dashboard page title, welcome message, or any other visible branding text.
